```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(DSPRqtlDataA)
library(DSPRqtl)
library(tidyverse)
```

#load in data (see DSPR tutorial) 

```{r}
data(A_X_12000000)


#just additive
pop_A <- A_X_12000000[,c("ril", "AA1","AA2","AA3","AA4","AA5","AA6","AA7","AA8")]


#filter RILs from top and bottom cohorts (common RILs appear once)

LearnMemRNAseqRILs <- pop_A %>% filter(ril %in% c("12044", "12285", "12138", "11189", "12022", "12084", "12324","11065", "12359", "11146", "11144", "11006", "11122", "11023", "12030", "12383", "11038", "11133", "11186", "12018", "12039", "12074", "11184", "11122", "12071", "11023" ))

str(LearnMemRNAseqRILs)

load(file ="../../Data/Peaks_wCIs.rda")

```
